When a page is called that corresponds to a part number in the database, and that page doesn't exist, this page is used to display it. Everywhere you see [item-code] the part number will be displayed. [item-field name] displays the name field in the products database. [item-data products name] is the same in this case, but if the products database contained more than one table (with ProductFiles) then [item-field name] could come from another table.
